column1: # File Inventory: Untracked Files (NOT in Git)
# - Reports: 9 files (5.6 MB) - NEW ARTIFACTS from current session (KEEP - git add!)
# - Frontend: 30 files (1.0 MB) - Components, pages, services (KEEP - git add!)
# - Figmadocs: 28 files (232 KB) - Comprehensive CiviCRM/Design docs (ARCHIVE or DELETE)
# - Scripts/Workflows: 16 files (25 KB) - CI/CD automation, n8n workflows (KEEP - git add!)
# - Configuration: 10 files (935 KB) - Dockerfiles, package-lock.json, Lighthouse reports (MIXED)
# Status: NEWLY CREATED in current reorganization session
# Recommendation: GIT ADD ALL (P0-Critical) - These are the primary deliverables
# - These 9 files are the OUTPUT of Artefakte 1-9 (TODO-List items)
# - Critical for PR documentation (chore/repo-docs-issues-reorg â†’ main)
# - Must be tracked to ensure reproducibility and audit trail
# - reports/todo-cleanup-COMPLETE.md contains all data from this file + additional analysis
# - Older version with less detail (77 TODOs vs. only basic list)
# - No unique information, safe to delete
# Status: NEW FEATURE DEVELOPMENT (CiviCRM integration, Payment flows, Layouts)
# Recommendation: GIT ADD ALL (P0-Critical production code)
# - Production frontend code (P0-Critical): Components, layouts, pages, services
# - Configuration files (P1-High): ESLint, Dockerfile, package-lock.json (reproducible builds)
# - Lighthouse reports (P2-Medium): GITIGNORE - auto-generated, large (960 KB), change frequently
# - Static assets (P3-Low): .gitkeep maintains directory structure, favicon.ico is 1 byte placeholder
# git add frontend/.eslintrc.cjs frontend/Dockerfile frontend/package-lock.json frontend/vitest.config.ts
# CATEGORY 4: FIGMA DESIGN SYSTEM DOCS (28 files, 232 KB)
# Status: COMPREHENSIVE DOCUMENTATION (CiviCRM integration, Design System, MCP setup)
# - P1-High: Core READMEs, Design System docs, Setup/Migration guides, RUNBOOK.md (ops)
# - P2-Medium: ARCHIVE - Integration docs (BANKING, EMAIL, GEOCODING, MARKETING, PAYMENTS, SEPA) are comprehensive but NOT actively maintained
# Status: CI/CD automation, n8n workflows, GitHub utilities
# Recommendation: GIT ADD ALL (P1-High operational scripts)
# - CI/CD scripts (P1-High): Automated security scans (Bandit, Codacy, Gitleaks, Trivy), MCP health checks
# - GitHub utilities (P1-High): create-issues.sh, issue-utils.sh (issue management automation)
# - GitHub utilities (P3-Low DELETE): comment-145.sh is issue-specific, one-time use, no value
# - n8n workflows (P1-High): Webhook queue processing, DLQ admin, queue monitoring
# - Deployment scripts (P1-High): Redis backup/restore, S3 mirroring, cron configuration
# Status: Quick-start guides, service status, MCP setup
# - DEVELOPMENT-QUICKSTART.md: Critical onboarding document (npm run dev:all, quality gates)
# - SERVICE-STATUS.md: Runtime health dashboard (service ports, health checks, dependencies)
# - Mitgliederantrag & Spenden.md: Business logic documentation (membership forms, donations)
# Recommendation: GIT ADD ALL (P1-High MCP workflows)
# - MCP_SETUP.md: Initial MCP server installation and configuration
# - MCP_SYNC.md: MCP synchronization workflows (Figma, GitHub, Filesystem)
# - 0001-mcp-hardening.md: Architecture Decision Record (ADR) for MCP security
# Status: AI-assisted development prompts and MCP instructions
# - ISSUE-DRAFTS.md (DELETE P3-Low): Temporary scratch file, no actionable content
# - README_MCP.md (P1-High): Core MCP documentation for GitHub Copilot workflows
# - copilot.mcp-servers.instructions.md (P0-Critical): MCP server configuration instructions (MUST track)
# - CiviCRM Interface + Integrationen + n8n.prompt.md (ARCHIVE P2-Medium): 79 KB mega-prompt, too large for active use
# - Other prompts (P2-Medium): Active development prompts (CiviCRM, n8n, Membership forms)
# - pa11yci.json: Pa11y accessibility testing configuration (WCAG 2.1 AA compliance)
# Status: Playwright E2E tests (Figma integration, Hero visual regression)
# Recommendation: GIT ADD ALL (P1-High test coverage)
# - figma-demo.spec.ts: Figma MCP integration E2E test
# - hero-visual.spec.ts: Visual regression test for homepage hero section
# - Priority: P0-Critical (14 files) + P1-High (48 files) + P2-Medium (9 files)

#   git add frontend/src/**/*.tsx frontend/src/**/*.ts frontend/.eslintrc.cjs frontend/Dockerfile frontend/package-lock.json frontend/vitest.config.ts frontend/public/docs/.gitkeep frontend/public/favicon.ico
#   git add scripts/ci/*.mjs scripts/figma-mcp-health.mjs scripts/mcp-check.mjs scripts/github/create-issues.sh scripts/github/issue-utils.sh
# - Priority: P2-Medium (comprehensive but NOT actively maintained)
# - Priority: P3-Low (duplicates, temporary files, one-time scripts)
# - P0-CRITICAL: 14 files (15.1%) - Reports, Compliance, MCP instructions, Frontend core
# - P1-HIGH: 48 files (51.6%) - Production code, Docs, Scripts, Workflows
# - P2-MEDIUM: 21 files (22.6%) - Archive candidates, Secondary docs
# - P3-LOW: 10 files (10.8%) - Delete candidates, Temporary files
# - Third Largest: frontend/package-lock.json (400 KB) - GIT ADD
# - Average File Size: 66.7 KB (skewed by 3 large files)
# - DSGVO Relevant: 0 files (no PII in untracked files)
# - Security Sensitive: 0 files (no secrets/API keys found)
# - Audit Trail: 9 reports files (MUST git add for reproducibility)
# - Production Code: 30 frontend files (MUST git add for deployment)
# 1. Execute GIT ADD commands (71 files) - Priority: P0-Critical, P1-High
# 2. Execute ARCHIVE commands (9 files) - Move to docs/archive/
# 3. Execute DELETE commands (3 files) - Remove temporary/duplicate files
# 4. Execute GITIGNORE additions (2 patterns) - Exclude auto-generated reports
# 5. Run git status to verify (should show ~71 new files staged)
# 6. Commit with message: "feat(repo): Add 71 untracked files (reports, frontend, scripts, docs)"
